title: Elavu Lyrics Aindhu Aindhu Aindhu Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
.
Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words
Enna petha raasa puttuknu poitta
enna petha raasa puttuknu poitta
poda.. indha boomiyil steady-yaai
staying yaarada.. yaarada
elagandapuramum jalagandapuramum..
enna petha ayyaa.

paada kattuvenea, paalu oothuvena
sondhakaaran vandhu ninna soru poduvena?
satti thookuvena, sangu oodhuvena?

sondha kaaranga yaarupa!!
sheekkka vekkaravangalaam seekiram vaiyunga
 peran pethi mukkiyama vaiyunga

Elavu, yaaraymey summa vidaadhu
 elavu, eppa varumnu theriyaadhu
 thaalai edukaama pogaadhu
 elavu

agni pandatha kodukaama satti thooki poriye
 raava kudipiye, wrong wrongaa pesuviye
 enna? persu pooducha?

ayyo ayyo ippadi alpaaisula poitye
 ayo ayyo ippadi naandukinu poitiye
 ayyo ayyo ippadi puttukinu poitiye

Elavu, yaaraymey summa vidaadhu
 elavu, eppa varumnu theriyaadhu
 thaalai edukaama pogaadhu
 elavu

ennada stuck aayidichaa
 vaayilaye motor vidura

seo.description: Get the complete Elavu Lyrics Aindhu Aindhu Aindhu Songs Lyrics from Aindhu Aindhu Aindhu. Read the lyrics penned by Na Muthukumar and composed by Simon and Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
